description: With just four ingredients, this tasty beef salad will feed the family in a flash.
name: 15-Minute Middle Eastern Beef Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g roasted pumpkin & grains salad kit
25 g McCormick baharat style street food seasoning

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, toss salad together with the dressing, pumpkin seeds and feta from the kit, and divide among bowls. Top with beef and chickpeas to serve.
